metadata.title: CVE-2018-19960 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: The debug_mode function in web/web.py in OnionShare through 1.3.1, when --debug is enabled, uses the /tmp/onionshare_server.log pathname for logging, which might allow local users to overwrite files or obtain sensitive information by using this pathname.

criterions.comment: onionshare package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
